description: Creates a revision of the asset.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the domain where the asset is being revised.

parameters.name: formsInput
parameters.description: The metadata forms to be attached to the asset as part of asset revision. (dict) --- The details of a metadata form. content (string) --- The content of the metadata form. The name of the metadata form. typeIdentifier (string) --- The ID of the metadata form type. typeRevision (string) --- The revision of the metadata form type.

nested_params.name: content
nested_params.description: The content of the metadata form.

nested_params.name: formName
nested_params.description: The name of the metadata form.

nested_params.name: typeIdentifier
nested_params.description: The ID of the metadata form type.

nested_params.name: typeRevision
nested_params.description: The revision of the metadata form type.

parameters.name: glossaryTerms
parameters.description: The glossary terms to be attached to the asset as part of asset revision. (string) ---

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Te revised name of the asset.

parameters.name: predictionConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration of the automatically generated business-friendly metadata for the asset. businessNameGeneration (dict) --- The business name generation mechanism. enabled (boolean) --- Specifies whether the business name generation is enabled.

nested_params.name: enabled
nested_params.description: Specifies whether the business name generation is enabled.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the asset revision occured.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who performed the asset revision.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The revised asset description.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain where the asset was revised.

nested_items.name: externalIdentifier
nested_items.description: The external identifier of the asset.

nested_items.name: firstRevisionCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the first asset revision occured.

nested_items.name: firstRevisionCreatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who performed the first asset revision.

nested_items.name: formsOutput
nested_items.description: The metadata forms that were attached to the asset as part of the asset revision.

nested_items.description: The content of the metadata form.
